<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unseat](/Feats.aspx?ID=1928) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=53)

**Prerequisites**
[Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1919)

**Requirements**
You are riding your mount and wielding a [jousting](/Traits.aspx?ID=186) weapon.

</column>

---

You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount. Make a melee Strike against a mounted opponent. If your attack hits, attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the opponent's Fortitude DC. If you succeed, the foe is knocked off its mount into a space of its choice adjacent to its mount. If you critically succeed, it lands [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
name: Unseat
requirement: You are riding your mount and wielding a  jousting  weapon.
